awd_abstract_narration: A Quality Engineering Laboratory enhances undergraduate Quality                 Control courses in the Department of Industrial Engineering at                  Kansas State University.  The laboratory covers both, Product                   Design and Statistical Process Control.  Students are                           responsible for proper selection of components for the best                     possible design that meets the functional requirements.  Off-                   line quality engineering and its influence on product quality                   is demonstrated through hands-on laboratory experiments.  In                    addition, students implement statistical process control                        techniques in a model production facility with two multi-                       station production lines after they have learned the underlying                 principles which include how quality control techniques relate                  to Computer Integrated Manufacturing.
